ComicInfo.Title: One Night at the Garden; Cracked Interviews the Game Show King; Cracked's Guide to Understanding Your Pet; Miracle Workers the World Has Never Heard of ('Til Now); The Cracked World of Lines; You're Really Overdoing It a Little When...; How Often Has This Happened to You???; Gag Lines for Every Profession; The Rhyme of the Thieving Sheik; Drecula
ComicInfo.Summary: British editions are identical to the US editions except for the price and cover date. The UK numbering includes Cracked Collectors' Editions.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-04-05 17:40:39. [Issue ID 250526]

ComicInfo.Inker: Howard Nostrand,Don Orehek,Bill Ward,Su Gumen,Sam Whitehead,John Severin,Warren Sattler,John Langton
